div.head: 女子經產余血
div.div: , surplus blood among women following delivery

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

form.pron: Nü zi jing chan yu xue

entry.def: , surplus blood among women following delivery

sense.def: Pathological Condition Combined Designation of all types of diseases caused by stagnant blood following delivery. Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry wu zhu yu 吳茱萸：根白皮，殺蟯蟲，治喉痹咳逆，止泄注，食 不消，女子經產余血 , “The white bark of the root kills pinworms and cures throat blockage and coughing with counterflow. It stops diarrhea and failure to digest food, and ends surplus blood among women following delivery ”.
